source.name: DOepatents Data Service
source.description: Contains bibliographic data for patents resulting from sponsored research by the Department of Energy and predecessor agencies.  ***Default request returns first one hundred records.  See Technical Documentation for instructions on obtaining additional records.  This data service allows the downloading of bibliographic records in formats that can be used to load the records into other databases or search tools.  ***To search the DOepatents database, use the Agency Program Page below.
